properties.entry: SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, A.DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NO, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) USING (REVIEW_NO)) A JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE ((REVIEW_TITLE LIKE ?) OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, A.DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NO, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) USING (REVIEW_NO)) A JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE ((REVIEW_TITLE LIKE ?) OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND SEASON = ? AND AGE = ? AND GROUP_WITH = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND SEASON = ? AND AGE = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND AGE = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND GROUP_WITH = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND SEASON = ? AND GROUP_WITH = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, A.DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NO, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) USING (REVIEW_NO)) A JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE ((REVIEW_TITLE LIKE ?) OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND SEASON = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW.DELETE_STATUS, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, REVIEW.PLACE_NO, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) A USING (REVIEW_NO) JOIN PLACE ON (REVIEW.PLACE_NO = PLACE.PLACE_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND REVIEW.DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT * FROM REVIEW_ATTACHMENT JOIN REVIEW USING (REVIEW_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT REVIEW_NO, LIKES FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT REVIEW_NO, LIKES FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND JOIN ( SELECT * FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) WHERE PLACE_CATEGORY = ?) USING (REVIEW_NO) GROUP BY REVIEW_NO ORDER BY LIKES DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND JOIN ( SELECT * FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO)) USING (REVIEW_NO) GROUP BY REVIEW_NO) A USING (REVIEW_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND REVIEW.DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, AGE, SEASON, GROUP_WITH, PLACE_NAME, MEMBER_ID, LIKES FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT REVIEW_NO, COUNT(*) LIKES FROM RECOMMEND JOIN ( SELECT * FROM REVIEW JOIN PLACE USING (PLACE_NO)) USING (REVIEW_NO) GROUP BY REVIEW_NO) A USING (REVIEW_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND REVIEW.DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC) B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM RECOMMEND WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM RECOMMEND WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO RECOMMEND VALUES (?, ?)

OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND SEASON = ? AND A.DELETE_STATUS = 'N') B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

AND ((REVIEW_TITLE LIKE ?) OR (REVIEW_CONTENT LIKE ?)) AND REVIEW.DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC) B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO,SCORE,REVIEW_TITLE,REVIEW_CONTENT,AGE,SEASON,GROUP_WITH,PLACE_NO,MEMBER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,?,1,?)
INSERT INTO REVIEW_ATTACHMENT (FILE_PATH,FILE_NO,FILE_NAME,REVIEW_NO,FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(?,SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,?,SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL,?)
